title: [Glaise Cnoc, Cemetery]
description: A pair of large oak trees flank the gravel path, creating a canopy of leaves overhead.  Sunlight filtering through the leaves creates a mottled pattern on the ground.  Despite the sun, the air remains cool and crisp.  Somewhere nearby, the tranquil voice of a songbird dances in the air.

A pair of large oak trees flank the gravel path, creating a canopy of leaves overhead.  Moonlight filtering through the leaves creates a mottled pattern on the ground.  From somewhere nearby, the hoots of an owl fill the cool, crisp night air.

Sunlight shines down upon a black marble marker, set into the ground amid a meadow of gently swaying flowers.  The marker is worn with age, but the inscription is still legible.  The sweet smell of wildflowers and the hypnotic humming of bees create a seductive setting.

Moonlight shines down upon a black marble marker, set into the ground amid a meadow of gently swaying flowers.  The marker is worn with age, but the inscription is still legible.  The sweet smell of wildflowers and the hypnotic humming of nocturnal insects create a seductive setting.
